mc.name: Ball Lightning
mc.oracleText:
Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

mc.name: Barbarian Ring
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Barbarian Ring deals 1 damage to you.
Threshold -- {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbarian Ring: Barbarian Ring deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Barbarian Ring deals 1 damage to you.
Threshold -- {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbarian Ring: Barbarian Ring deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

mc.name: Boggart Ram-Gang
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
mc.printedText:
Haste
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
mc.flavorText:
"We're going to need a bigger gate."
--Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

mc.name: Browbeat
mc.oracleText: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
mc.printedText: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Even the threat of power has power."
--Jeska, warrior adept

mc.name: Chain Lightning
mc.oracleText: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.
mc.printedText: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

mc.name: Cinder Pyromancer
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Cinder Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target player.
Whenever you cast a red spell, you may untap Cinder Pyromancer.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Cinder Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target player.
Whenever you cast a red spell, you may untap Cinder Pyromancer.
mc.flavorText: "If the whole world burns, I'll never grow cold."

mc.name: Figure of Destiny
mc.oracleText:
{RW}: Figure of Destiny becomes a 2/2 Kithkin Spirit.
{RW}{RW}{RW}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a 4/4 Kithkin Spirit Warrior.
{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes an 8/8 Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with flying and first strike.
mc.printedText:
{RW}: Figure of Destiny becomes a 2/2 Kithkin Spirit.
{RW}{RW}{RW}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a 4/4 Kithkin Spirit Warrior.
{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}{RW}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes an 8/8 Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with flying and first strike.

mc.name: Fire Servant
mc.oracleText: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
mc.printedText: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
mc.flavorText:
"Elemental fire shimmers with rose hues and, unlike terrestrial blazes, smolders long after it's extinguished."
--Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

mc.name: Fireball
mc.oracleText:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
mc.printedText:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

mc.name: Fireblast
mc.oracleText:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

mc.name: Flames of the Blood Hand
mc.oracleText: Flames of the Blood Hand deals 4 damage to target player. The damage can't be prevented. If that player would gain life this turn, that player gains no life instead.
mc.printedText: Flames of the Blood Hand deals 4 damage to target player. The damage can't be prevented. If that player would gain life this turn, that player gains no life instead.
mc.flavorText: Many ogres extracted blood oaths from the oni they summoned. Others simply extracted blood.

mc.name: Ghitu Encampment
mc.oracleText:
Ghitu Encampment enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText:
Ghitu Encampment enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land.

mc.name: Grim Lavamancer
mc.oracleText: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

mc.name: Hammer of Bogardan
mc.oracleText:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Hellspark Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: Jackal Pup
mc.oracleText: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
mc.printedText: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
mc.flavorText: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

mc.name: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage
mc.oracleText:
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target blue permanent.
{1}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
{5}{R}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText:
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target blue permanent.
{1}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
{5}{R}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

mc.name: Keldon Champion
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player.
mc.printedText:
Haste
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player.

mc.name: Keldon Marauders
mc.oracleText:
Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Keldon Marauders enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player.
mc.printedText:
Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Keldon Marauders enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player.

mc.name: Lightning Bolt
mc.oracleText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Mogg Fanatic
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: "I got it! I got it! I--"

mc.name: Mogg Flunkies
mc.oracleText: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
mc.printedText: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
mc.flavorText: They'll attack whatever's in front of them--as long as you tell them where that is.

mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

mc.oracleText: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
mc.printedText: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
mc.flavorText: Man versus nature is not a fair fight.

mc.name: Reverberate
mc.oracleText: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
mc.printedText: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
mc.flavorText:
"I'm not indecisive. I just don't like to limit my options."
--Maxti, pyromancer

mc.name: Spark Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Trample, haste (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
mc.printedText:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
mc.flavorText: Vulshok shamans could never keep them alive for more than a few seconds, yet those few seconds seemed to be enough.

mc.name: Sudden Impact
mc.oracleText: Sudden Impact deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.
mc.printedText: Sudden Impact deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.
mc.flavorText:
"Some say it's better to think before you act. While those people are considering all the options, that's usually when I kill them."
--Dravus, lava mage

mc.name: Teetering Peaks
mc.oracleText:
Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.
When Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.
When Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Thunderbolt
mc.oracleText: Choose one -- Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player; or Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.printedText: Choose one -- Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player; or Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Vulshok Sorcerer
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Haste
{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.
